entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this morning and 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1400 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
